content: this listing is for a heart snowflake crochet pattern this snowflake will be perfect for christmas or valentine s day decorations free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-heart-snowflake-pattern/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format video tutorial https //youtu be/b8vldhou5ym si=qhoz9c1bzg94p6gc
